title: Jack Frost

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- All Everfrost players are Astral and redirect immune.
- You have a layer of Basic defense that can prevent one attack.

- If Eyisa dies, you gain the attribute "Whenever a player is roleblocked by anything while you're alive, they'll be notified that they're covered in frost. If they're not visited by at least two other non-Everfrost players the next night, they're dealt an Astral Basic attack by you at the end of that night. This effect cannot be prevented by anything." and Basic defense.
